title: Trees
content:
A couple of photos that I am considering for a benefit exhibit for the Nantucket Land Council. The theme is Love of the Land - Nantucket Trees.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120729135606im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NLC_VanLieu_treessm_3757.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120729135606im_/http:/typophile.com/files/trees2_4662.jpg)
author: Sharon Van Lieu

comments.content:
This is the Creation of God.  
Now show me what others besides Him have created.  
Flowers 4 All
these are beautiful! i love them!
Lovely work, Sharon! :-) Thanks for sharing.
